message.content:
I need to identify the beginning balance of cash and cash equivalents from the financial statements.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see there is a specific line item:
```
| Cash and Cash Equivalents |  | 2024-01-28 |
| Beginning Balance  | 8000000.00 | 2024-01-28 |
```

This shows that the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period was 8,000,000.00.

I can verify this by looking at the balance sheet, which shows:
```
| Cash on Hand | 3000000.00 | 2023-12-31 | 1379124.39 | 2024-01-28 |
| Bank Deposits | 5000000.00 | 2023-12-31 | 126796.33 | 2024-01-28 |
```

The sum of initial cash on hand (3,000,000.00) and initial bank deposits (5,000,000.00) is 8,000,000.00, which matches the beginning balance of cash and cash equivalents in the cash flow statement.

Therefore, the value of cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period is 8,000,000.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '8000000.00'} }
```
